links.title: Divergence Watchlist - 10/30/2017 - JBZ Stocks
links.description: Watchlist Happy Halloween! The market finished extremely bullish, pushing the S&P 500 up to the top of the channel. The slow stochastic is overbought, but the fast stochastic did pull back below the 80 line, setting up a possible bearish divergence.

links.title: Why This Money Manager Is Bullish General Motors (NYSE: GM), Bearish Tesla (NASDAQ: TSLA) And Still Waiting On Ford (NYSE: F)
links.description: Internal and external pressures are molding a new U.S. auto industry. A sharp and structural shift from personal vehicle ownership to ridesharing drives an enduring downturn in auto sales, while trends toward electric vehicles upend legacy businesses.

links.title: How Great Traders Manage Fear
links.description: Learn more about getting access to our full nightly recaps and unlocking our next day "watch list" here: http://accessatrader.com/ In this teaser of episode 4 of Pancakes & Pivots, Dan talks about understanding fear and leveraging it to create the best risk-reward trading scenarios in your favor.
